oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Narvel Felts interview - Joe Suglia - WBUK - part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a recording of an interview with Narvel Felts (performer), conducted by Joe Suglia for radio station WBUK.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Narvel Felts promotes Michigan Radio Limited -- Narvel Felts promotes WBUK -- Narvel Felts introductions for Joe Suglia and WBUK -- Joe Suglia introduces Narvel Felts -- Felts talks about his first big record being the 30th record he had recorded -- Felts talks about his record Honey Love and why it got banned -- Suglia comments on Felts' wide vocal range -- Felts talks about Drift Away -- Felts talks about his manager/producer having the final say on Felts' material -- Felts talks about Reconsider Me -- Felts talks about Funny How Time Slips Away -- Felts talks about Raindrops -- Felts talks about When Your Good Love Was Mine and I Wanna Stay -- Joe Suglia talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Felts, Narvel;
